Welcome to the personal website of Cornelis Kolbach. This is where he likes to blog about his professional field, to show his work and where he may be contacted.

Most recent posts

Anatomy of a (web) document

An article on the usage of (x)HTML and the application of the Document Object Model (DOM).

Showcase: Bank Bercoop

One of the challenges in building a new website for this Frisian private bank was to design a navigation system for the website in which visitors wouldn’t get lost, but that would still show the vast amount of pages this company wanted to publish.

Showcase: Flexyz website

Designed and created for Flexyz BV, Zeewolde, The Netherlands.

Showcase: Petonline

BV is a long existing company (Since 1857) in the north of The Netherlands that sells a wide variety of products, including office supplies and IT-solutions.

Showcase: Ovarius

When Cornelis was finishing his multi media studies back in 1997, he created a game that features a space ship, which he designed with 3D modelling and animation tools that were available that time.
